channel.title: An explanation of the role of the Buses used within Computer Systems
channel.description:
Heya,
Left my coursework kinda late... i got like 6 hours before i need to upload it and im virtually done except for this question.
[b]"An explanation of the role of the Buses used within Computer Systems and how they interact with the CPU So add information to show the process of data flowing from input, RAM, CPU, Storage and output naming the buses it uses."[/b]
I understand where the data flows from and where to flows to, but i dont remember what buss's it uses... or even fully understand the question to be hounest. Can anyone give me a hand?

item.title: An explanation of the role of the Buses used within Computer Systems
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“wyn10, post:2, topic:267442”]Wow the wording on that question makes it very confusing.

I did some searching and I think I found help here:
http://faculty.frostburg.edu/cosc/htracy/COSC100/NS_CPU/Cpu_ram.htm

The reading is towards the bottom.[/quote]

off topic: you sig makes you look retarded… It’s moparscape not moparisthebest.org, MITB.com & MITB.ORG are the same sites…

anyway only thing I know about buses is you have a data bus an and address bus.

Read full topic

and how they interact with the CPU
So add information to show the process of data flowing from input, RAM, CPU, Storage and output naming the buses it uses.”
